sentences: Kas sa siis koju ei tulegi? Tule koju! Selles h채채les oli kuum palve.
Mul on teile v채ike palve: kas sa ei saaks mulle raha laenata?
Enne lauda istumist pidas pereisa l체hikese palve.
context: The Estonian word 'palve' has two main meanings: 1) A request, petition, or appeal made to someone else for fulfillment of a wish or desire; can be urgent, passionate, humble, courteous, or heartfelt. This includes formal requests written or oral to authorities, as well as personal appeals. 2) A verbal or mental prayer, supplication, or address to God or divine beings with wishes, requests for help, expressions of gratitude, or religious devotion. It can refer to specific prayer texts, the act of praying, or a prayer service in a school setting.
